group_1.narration: The weather forecast says “clear skies this evening"@so it’s the perfect night to view the moon!
Speaking of the moon,@I used to wonder when I was a kid..
When the moon faces the Earth,@it only shows the side with the rabbit and its mochi.
Why doesn’t it show the “other face” on its back?
According to my physics teacher,@this is because the moon’s cycles of@“revolution” and “rotation” are the same.
It’s apparently quite common in space.

group_1.textCenter: (I don’t know what the standard of “common”@is in space, but...)

group_1.narration: Ah... I am Yukika Nanase,@a first-year student at Mizuna's Girl's School@and a Magical Girl.
Yes, I am one of those who reluctantly@set foot into the world of Magical Girls:@the "back side" of common sense
which most people will live their@whole lives without ever knowing.

group_1.textCenter: (Though with all that said, I am, so to speak,@in the role of “Villager A”.)
(Even on the night of the decisive battle that@brought disaster to Kamihama City...)
(I still don’t really understand what happened.)
(Even though I was one of many “Black@Feathers”...)
(I didn't have any desire to advance and@become a White Feather someday.)
(Because those White Feathers who manage the@Black Feathers are more suited to shining.)

group_1.narration: Yes, like the pride of Mizuna Girl's School,@Miss Tsukuyo Akatsuki...!
Even in Mizuna Ward,@where many wealthy families produce spoiled children,@Miss Akatsuki is a genuine angel...

group_1.textCenter: (While I always get saddled with Student Council@Officer duty because I seem "sort of" ladylike...)
(Miss Akatsuki has an aura leagues above@mine.)
(After all, even though I'm well-acquainted@with Miss Akatsuki at school...)
(My presence is so faint that she still doesn't@even know I'm a Magical Girl.)
(Although, I still don’t know if “former” Black@Feather is accurate.)
(It's only been a few days since the decisive battle@ended, and the Wings of the Magius are in turmoil.)
(And I haven't exactly reached out to them@myself, either...)

group_1.narration: By the way, if you were to ask what@the current Kamihama looks like...
You would ask “Is this tranquility@before or after the storm?”
On the surface, it seems that the@peaceful days are continuing.
However, it seems that there are more@opportunities to feel the presences of@Magical Girls that I have never seen before.
...It's just a vague feeling, but that's@essentially how things are nowadays.
